name: Fleeing Harpies
description:
You play as one of the Harpy Sisters, Iris. You dodge the wind brothers after coming seeing your sisters harassed King Phineus. Survive as long as possible and maybe then, you decide to actually flee. Pog

Movement:

Normal Mode: Arrow Keys to Move

Rainbow Mode: Arrows Keys to Rotate

Change Modes: Up Key

W in case you find decoration or the background to be to annoying. Please do not judge these graphics. Q if you want the old background and decorations like it was meant to be. V to mute the game. Also, there is a bug where if you go near the wall, the screen might stop for a while. Sometimes too, the sword acts weirdly at the beginning but it isn't much of a game breaker. 

Programmer: Takago/Catago101, Miyaki

Artist: Miyaki,  Takago/Catago101

Music:  mvrasseli

Sound Effects: Miyaki in sfxr
